summary: This bill, the "Directing Resources for Officers Navigating Emergencies Act of 2025" (DRONE Act of 2025), aims to authorize the use of specific Department of Justice grants for the purchase and operation of unmanned aircraft systems (drones) to enhance public safety. It amends the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968, specifically focusing on Byrne and COPS grants, to include funding for drone programs.
